comments.text:
Couldn't we handle this the same way that pop-ups are handled: if a site attempts to hijack a mouse-button, prompt the user whether he wants to allow this, and remember the decision for the next time the site is visited.

That way, if there is a legitimate need (game), the user could allow it, and refuse it in all other cases.
